Review_title: A proposal that kills a reputation
Review_Text: Macchiarini's experimental trachea patients did not heal, In fact, they were dying. However, Macchiarini was still coasting on the glowing publicity that followed their initial surgeries, leaving two of his colleagues at prestigious Karolinska Institute to deal with the carnage of his dubious treatment. Together they wrote a damning report exposing Macchiarini's falsified research. Perhaps predictably, the Karolinska administers turned on the whistleblowers rather than its cash cow.Meanwhile, Italian doctor started to have an affair which undoubtedly caused to shadow his reputation , as the journalist lover got suspicious of his pre-marriage promises. What would be like if he did not propose to him? Better if you look from that perspective???
